CelestialBodies

Class Planet

  • java.lang.Object
    • CelestialBodies.Planet

  • public class Planet
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a planet with x, y coordinates, mass, momentum, and a method for drawing an image of the planet.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Planet(double m, double l)
      Simple constructor for planet
      Planet(double m, double l, int x, int y, java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)
      Creates a planet with image and specific position
      Planet(double m, double l, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Creates a planet with specific width, height and position

        width - width of the planet
        height - height of the planet
